summary: 该插件用于检测Apache Shiro框架中存在的多种认证绕过漏洞，包括但不限于CVE-2016-6802、CVE-2020-11989、CVE-2020-1957、CVE-2020-13933和CVE-2020-17523，通过构造特定payload测试目标系统是否存在相关漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect multiple authentication bypass vulnerabilities in the Apache Shiro framework, including but not limited to CVE-2016-6802, CVE-2020-11989, CVE-2020-1957, CVE-2020-13933, and CVE-2020-17523. It constructs specific payloads to test whether the target system has related vulnerabilities.
